about_the_game:
Field Tactics is a Turn-Based Tactical War Simulator inspired by ancient warfare. Set up your formations, utilise a variety of tactics and lead your army to victory.

Your goal is to either capture the enemy Commander or annihilate the rest of their army.

Match Types

  • Online Casual: Play without risking your reputation, it is the perfect arena to test new and innovative strategies against worthy opponents.

  • Online Ranked: Test your mettle and etch your name into the annals of history. Use every strategy in your arsenal to come one step closer to becoming a Grand Commander.

  • Local: An opportunity to play away from the prying eyes of your enemies. Formulate new and exciting plans, or perhaps just a friendly contest between members of your inner circle.

  • AI: Experiment without giving anything away to those whose eyes watch like a hawk. Or use it to keep your mind sharp while members of your inner circle are otherwise occupied.

Pieces

  • Foot Soldier: The most common piece on the battlefield, they are hard workers who can and will give their all for victory.


  • Archer: A vital piece in the army, they watch over the front lines and prey on those that would dare to step too close.


  • Chariot: They have the potential to be the most devastating weapon. Once they get going, they can't be stopped and will mow down everything in their path.


  • Lieutenant: The most loyal subordinates to the Commander, they are best at controlling the flow of the battle and creating sparks that can turn into a great blaze.


  • Commander: The Commander can fly across the battlefield, turning the tide at any given moment. But be careful, as diving too deep could land them in the enemy's trap.
